amendment.description: To strengthen relations between the United States and the countries in the Western Balkans, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3811 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3811 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 3748. To strengthen relations between the United States and the countries in the Western Balkans, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3811 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3811 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
